name: Castle Lib 2D
description:
Hi my name is Midgento and i'm quite new to game developing. This is my first game and i would like to share it with you and tell me your honest opinions as it is very appreciated and helpful so i can improve myself.

Controls:

W - move forward

A - move left

S - move back

D - move right

Weapon Controls:

Hold down Left Mouse button - Charge up Arrows

Release Left Mouse button - Fire Arrows

An archer is the sole military survivor of an attack on the kingdom. He must defeat all the enemy soldiers and liberate each of the castles of the kingdom. All the while collecting coins that he will need in the future to raise an army to defend the kingdom.
